professional_summary: Experienced IT professional with expertise in database management, system administration, and project management. Seeking to leverage technical skills and certifications to advance in the field of information technology.

key_responsibilities: Provided technical support and system maintenance for organizational applications.
Managed user access permissions and system security measures.
Assisted in developing and implementing new IT policies.
Overseen the IT infrastructure and operations for the organization.
Supervised a team of junior IT staff members.
Implemented new software solutions to improve efficiency.
Provided consulting services for IT infrastructure and cybersecurity.
Conducted regular system audits and vulnerability assessments.

technical_skills:
Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Visio)",

            "Programming Languages: SQL, HTML with CSS, Java",
            "Networking: TCP/IP, Ethernet, Wireless (Cisco, Apple)",
            "Security: Firewalls, Antivirus Software, Intrusion Detection Systems",
            "Project Management: Microsoft Project, Jira
